import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { loadPosts } from './redux/actions/postAction'; export default function ProjectItem() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(loadPosts()); }, [dispatch]); return (
